title: Fantasy LCS is broken?
body: EU players play less games compared to NA players, so aren't EU players going to generate less points? Can someone confirm or deny this because if this is the case then this is going to be very disappointing and a waste of everyone's time.

replies.body: Don't run EU players on weeks where they only play one game. Besides that, depending on which option for points you selected when creating your league it's not an issue.
Please riot, can we fix this? This is going to ruin fantasy lcs for a ton of the players.
